trigger.send: PlaySound (8, "help.wav", false, -3, 0)
PlaySound (6, "hopeknow.wav", false, -5, 0)
PlaySound (7, "starwars.wav", false, -5, 0)
PlaySound (0, "shield_on.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.match: *The energy shield's display blinks red: Warming Up
trigger.send: PlaySound (0, "shield_wear.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.name: targetlock_sound1
trigger.send: PlaySound (1, "targetlock.wav", false, -5, 0) EnableTrigger("targetlock_sound1", false) DoAfterSpecial(5, 'EnableTrigger("targetlock_sound1", true)', sendto.script)

trigger.name: targetlock_sound2
trigger.send: DoAfterSpecial(0.1, 'PlaySound (2, "targetlock.wav", false, -5, 0)', sendto.script) EnableTrigger("targetlock_sound2", false) DoAfterSpecial(5, 'EnableTrigger("targetlock_sound2", true)', sendto.script)

trigger.send: DoAfterSpecial(0.1, 'PlaySound (2, "ship_landing.wav", false, -5, 0)', sendto.script) EnableTrigger("ship_landing_sound2", false) DoAfterSpecial(5, 'EnableTrigger("ship_landing_sound2", true)', sendto.script)

trigger.match: *The ship lurches slightly as it comes out of hyperspace.
trigger.send: PlaySound (0, "hyperspeed_out.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.name: ship_landing_sound5
trigger.send: DoAfterSpecial(0.1, 'PlaySound (5, "ship_landing.wav", false, -5, 0)', sendto.script) EnableTrigger("ship_landing_sound5", false) DoAfterSpecial(5, 'EnableTrigger("ship_landing_sound5", true)', sendto.script)

trigger.match: *You activate the device and a shield of blue energy surrounds you.
trigger.send: PlaySound (0, "shield_on.wav", false, -12, 0)
PlaySound (0, "blaster.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.match: *You set to work repairing the damaged *.
trigger.send: PlaySound (7, "repair.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.match: *Your energy shield's display turns solid green as it comes online.
trigger.send: PlaySound (0, "shield_charged.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.match: Damn! Your datapad returns an error message!!
trigger.send: PlaySound (0, "access_denied.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.match: Damn, you must have entered the wrong data!
trigger.send: PlaySound (0, "access_denied.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.match: You fail to call up the right info on the datapad.
trigger.send: PlaySound (0, "access_denied.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.match: You scan * and wait for the databank to retrieve a file on *.
trigger.send: PlaySound (9, "lookup.wav", false, -12, 0)

trigger.match: Your wounds heal slightly as the bacta flows over you.
trigger.send: PlaySound (0, "bacta.wav", false, -7, 0)
PlaySound (9, "computer.wav", false, -5, 0)
PlaySound (0, "door.wav", false, -6, 0)

alias.send: EnableTriggerGroup("ambience", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Ambience sounds are now enabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("engineer", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Engineering sounds are now disabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("engineer", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Engineering sounds are now enabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("misc", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Miscellaneous sounds are now disabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("misc", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Miscellaneous sounds are now enabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("mundane", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Mundane sounds are now disabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("mundane", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Mundane sounds are now enabled.")

EnableTriggerGroup("sptravel", false) EnableTriggerGroup("spcombat", false) EnableTriggerGroup("grtravel", false) EnableTriggerGroup("grcombat", false) EnableTriggerGroup("ambience", false) EnableTriggerGroup("engineer", false) EnableTriggerGroup("misc", false) EnableTriggerGroup("mundane", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "All sounds are now disabled.")

EnableTriggerGroup("sptravel", true) EnableTriggerGroup("spcombat", true) EnableTriggerGroup("grtravel", true) EnableTriggerGroup("grcombat", true) EnableTriggerGroup("ambience", true) EnableTriggerGroup("engineer", true) EnableTriggerGroup("misc", true) EnableTriggerGroup("mundane", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "All sounds are now enabled.")

ColourNote ("grey", "black", "") ColourNote ("grey", "black", " -Legends of the Jedi Sounds-") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundhelp - Brings up this page") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundall on/off - Toggles the plugin") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundsptravel on/off - Toggles space travel sounds") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundspcombat on/off - Toggles space combat sounds") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundgrtravel on/off - Toggles ground travel sounds") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundgrcombat on/off - Toggles ground combat sounds") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundambience on/off - Toggles ambience sounds") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundengineer on/off - Toggles engineer sounds") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundmisc on/off - Toggles miscellaneous sounds") ColourNote ("grey", "black", "soundmundane on/off - Toggles mundane sounds")
EnableTriggerGroup("sptravel", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Space travel sounds are now disabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("sptravel", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Space travel sounds are now enabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("spcombat", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Space combat sounds are now disabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("spcombat", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Space combat sounds are now enabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("grtravel", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Ground travel sounds are now disabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("grtravel", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Ground travel sounds are now enabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("grcombat", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Ground combat sounds are now disabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("grcombat", true) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Ground combat sounds are now enabled.")
EnableTriggerGroup("ambience", false) ColourNote ("grey", "black", "Ambience sounds are now disabled.")
